ovdesc.p: This application used to group the BR's. BR's can be grouped irrespective of the start date or Bill Amount or Liability Customer. However all the BR's must be of same currency.
BL.BATCH can be added to the BL.BILL application for BL contract processing.
After the no of days as mentioned in BL.PARAMETER to move it to history from the date of maturity of the BL contract, these details will be moved to history file- BL.BATCH.HIST.

desc.p: This field defines the ID of the Authorised Bill Register(s) attached to this Bill Batch.
This is a multi-value field that facilitates inclusion of more than one Bill Register under this batch.
Should be a valid Bill Register ID
Should not be a matured Bill(s) or Bill(s) already attached to other batches
All BR's must be of same currency.
No Input field. The field will be blank when the batch is authorised but defaults the BL.Bill id when batch is attached to BL.BILL.
12 digit BL ID

Identifies the amount to be charged against the charge code entered in the associated value of the CHARGE.CODE field.
The amount entered in this field represents the charge amount to be levied for the associated charge code.

This amount may be defaulted, dependent on the charge code entered, from the FT.CHARGE.TYPE table. In this case the amount defined in the FLAT.AMOUNT field of FT.CHARGE.TYPE, for the currency of the loan will be taken as the default.

Valid value "CUR" or "MAT"
Identifies the type of charge(s) to be levied as defined on the FT.CHARGE.TYPE / FT.COMMISSION.TYPE table.
This table contains a record for each charge type available. Each record contains a description, a default charge amount and the P&L category which is to be credited whenever the charge is levied.
The description from the FT.CHARGE/COMMISSION.TYPE will be displayed as an enrichment to this field.

Whenever a charge is processed the account entered in the associated CHARGE.ACCOUNT field will be debited. The P&L category defined on the FT.CHARGE.TYPE record for the charge code will be credited. In BL module charges are calculated and charged during BL.BILL application processing.
1 - 2 alphanumeric characters. Multi-value field
Must be a valid charge code on the FT.CHARGE.TYPE / FT.COMMISSION.TYPE file.
The same combination of charge code cannot be duplicated.

This field specifies the sum of all maximum available amounts BL.REGISTERs for disbursement in a BL.BATCH record.Maximum amount available for disbursement will be calculated as MAX.AVAIL.AMT = AMOUNT(of BL.REGISTER) – (AMOUNT * RET.MARGIN/100)
This field denotes maximum amount that can be disbursed out of a BL.BATCH record. It is the sum of all MAX.AVAIL.AMOUNT of all BL.REGISTER records attached in the batch
